x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

The solution would use ServiceNow Now Platform, Predictive Intelligence, and Flow Designer to collect, analyze, and visualize public health data automatically.
Hospitals and clinics could submit daily case reports via ServiceNow forms or APIs. Predictive AI models would detect abnormal patterns and trigger alerts to health officers through ServiceNow Incident Management and Performance Analytics dashboards.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Integration with hospital EHR systems or government health databases (via APIs), and a secure cloud environment for handling sensitive data (e.g., ServiceNow HIPAA-compliant instance).

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Data privacy and compliance with local health regulations (GDPR, NHS standards).
  • Ensuring consistent data quality and standard reporting formats.
  • Integration complexity across different healthcare IT systems.
